title: Where is Trump’s military parade taking place? See route, map
shortDescription: The Grand Military Parade marking the Army’s 250th year coincides with Trump’s birthday on June 14. Here's where the procession will go through D.C.

title: Senate Republicans signal plans to tweak SALT cap deal in Trump tax bill
shortDescription: The tax deduction was crucial to getting the bill through the House. Senate action would set up a showdown with blue state Republicans.

title: Trump's travel ban is back: What happened during first term?
shortDescription: Starting June 9, foreign nationals from a dozen countries will be banned from entering the US due to national security concerns.

title: Trump orders investigation of Joe Biden's alleged 'cognitive decline'
shortDescription: Trump ordered an investigation of his predecessor, Joe Biden, for alleged 'cognitive decline' and use of an autopen to sign official documents.

title: President Trump's travel ban 2.0
shortDescription: President Donald Trump signed a proclamation that bans travel from 12 countries and restricts seven others.

title: Musk slams Trump tax bill: 'Kill the bill'
shortDescription: Elon Musk blasted President Trump’s new tax bill as a “disgusting abomination,” urging millions of followers to lobby lawmakers to “kill the bill.”

title: Trump bans Harvard from admitting new international students
shortDescription: About 25% of Harvard's enrollment consists of international students, and university officials have been pushing back against White House attacks.

title: Trump signs proclamation banning travel into US from 12 nations
shortDescription: President Trump has issued a travel ban blocking the entry of foreign nationals from 12 countries and partially restricting travel from seven others.

title: Karine Jean-Pierre leaves Dems for Independents
shortDescription: Former White House press secretary Karine Jean-Pierre talks about leaving the Democratic party in her upcoming book slated for release in October.

title: Musk and Trump's relationship: From $250 million to 'kill bill'
shortDescription: What happened with Elon Musk and Donald Trump? The billionaire was once a top Trump campaign donor. Now he said in an X(Twitter) post 'kill bill.'

title: Trump cannot proceed with gutting US Education Department, court rules
shortDescription: DOJ had asked for a swift ruling from the 1st Circuit US Court of Appeals so that it could promptly take the case up to the Supreme Court if it lost.

title: Trump talks to Putin over phone
shortDescription: President Donald Trump spoke with Russian President Vladimir Putin in an hour-long phone call, which he described as a "good conversation."

title: Trump admin may rescind $4B for California High-Speed Rail project
shortDescription: Trump's administration says there is no viable path forward for California's High-Speed Rail project and gave the state until mid-July to respond.

title: How fentanyl reaches the US and the role of Trump's China tariffs
shortDescription: US President Donald Trump has imposed new tariffs on Chinese goods, citing Beijing’s failure to stop the export of chemicals used to produce fentanyl.

title: 'Kill the bill': Elon Musk tries to nuke Trump's GOP tax plan
shortDescription: Musk's vocal criticism could inflame existing tensions over the bill among congressional Republicans.

title: Republicans defend Brown student who sent DOGE-style emails to admin
shortDescription: Alex Shieh, a rising junior at Brown University, sent DOGE-style emails to college administrators, prompting disciplinary actions.

title: Trump-backed Gaza aid sites close after 'mass casualty' shootings
shortDescription: Dozens of people were killed and injured near an aid site run by the Gaza Humanitarian Foundation, a Trump administration-backed aid group.

title: Trump agrees with Elizabeth Warren on abolishing cap on soaring debt
shortDescription: Trump said he agreed with a longtime rival, Sen. Elizabeth Warren, on the need to abolish the federal cap on borrowing.

title: Trump relays Putin's plans to retaliate against Ukraine after attack
shortDescription: Trump said his latest call with Putin wouldn't lead to "immediate peace" as he relayed the Russian leader's plans to retaliate against Ukraine.

title: Trump's judicial nominees face scrutiny for inexperience
shortDescription: Democrats and liberal observers are questioning whether President Trump's nominees for the federal bench have enough experience.

title: Speaker Johnson: Musk is 'flat wrong' about Trump tax bill
shortDescription: The House speaker responded to Elon Musk calling Trump's tax bill a “disgusting abomination” and threatened its supporters with political payback.

title: Kristi Noem said he sent Trump death threat. Police say he was framed.
shortDescription: Milwaukee police quickly suspected a man arrested by ICE was framed in Trump death threat. Then DHS Secretary Kristi Noem accused him of the crime.

title: Skid marks: Trump's fast start has hit some speedbumps
shortDescription: The rollercoaster of the first 100 days has become a bit of a slog for President Trump. What does he do next?

title: Trump's tariffs to curb US economic growth and reduce deficit: report
shortDescription: The CBO analysis says Trump's tariffs over the next decade would reduce deficits by $2.8 trillion while also curbing economic growth by 0.6 percent.

title: Who is Kai Trump? Mar-a-Lago wall-jumper said he wanted to marry her
shortDescription: Anthony Thomas Reyes was arrested on a trespassing charge at Donald Trump's Florida estate, Mar-a-Lago. He said he wanted to marry Kai Trump.

title: 'He is unbelievable!!!': Trump slams Powell after hiring slowdown
shortDescription: President Trump ramped up his call for Fed Chair Jerome Powell to lower interest rates after a new report showed sluggish hiring in May.
